mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT A.MESSAGE_ID --수신번호 , A.RCV_ID --사용자아이디 , A.RCV_NM --사용자이름 , A.CLNT_CD --거래처 , C.CLNT_NM --거래처명 , B.NAME AS MNG_NM --담당자명 , A.TMPLAT_DIV --발송구분 , (SELECT FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(A.TMPLAT_DIV) FROM DUAL) AS TMPLAT_DIV_NM --발송구분명 , A.SENDG_STATUS --발송상태 --, (SELECT FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(A.SENDG_STATUS) FROM DUAL) AS SENDG_STATUS_NM --발송상태 , CASE WHEN(A.SENDG_STATUS='OK') THEN '성공' ELSE A.SENDG_STATUS END AS SENDG_STATUS_CHK -- 정상코드면 '성공' 아니면 에러코드 표시 , CASE WHEN(A.SENDG_STATUS='OK') THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS SENDG_STATUS_YN -- 정상코드면 'Y' 아니면 N , A.TITLE --메시지제목 , A.MESSAGE --알림톡메시지 , A.MOBILE --연락처 , A.NAME_TO --받는사람 , NVL(TO_CHAR(A.SEND_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), TO_CHAR(A.SEND_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) AS SEND_DT --보낸일자 , A.CREAT_ID --생성자 , A.CREAT_PGM --생성프로그램ID , NVL(TO_CHAR(A.CREAT_DTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), TO_CHAR(A.CREAT_DTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) AS CREAT_DTTM --생성일시 , A.UDT_ID --최종변경자 , A.UDT_PGM --최종수정프로그램ID , TO_CHAR(A.UDT_DTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') UDT_DTTM --최종변경일시 FROM TB_BM18M01 A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_BM02M01 AS C ON A.CLNT_CD = C.CLNT_CD --거래처정보 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CM06M01 AS B ON A.CREAT_ID = B.ID --발송자 정보 WHERE 1=1
ORDER BY CREAT_DTTM DESC ) X WHERE 1=1
AND X.TMPLAT_DIV = #{tmplatDiv}
AND X.CLNT_NM LIKE '%' || #{clntNm} || '%'
AND X.SENDG_STATUS_YN = #{sendgStatusYn}
AND X.NAME_TO LIKE '%' || #{nameTo} || '%'
AND X.MOBILE LIKE '%' || #{mobile} || '%'

SELECT 'KKO'||TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YY') || LPAD(TB_SM18M01_SQ01.NEXTVAL, 6, 0) MAX_MESSAGE_ID , T.* FROM ( SELECT A.TODO_ID , A.NAME , #{todoTitle} AS TODO_TITL , A.TEL_NO , #{todoNo} AS TODO_NO , '' AS SANCTN_SN , (SELECT MSSAGE_DESC AS MSSAGE_DESC FROM TB_BM17M01 WHERE 1=1 AND TMPLAT_DIV = #{tmplatDiv}) AS MESSAGE_DESC , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS SEND_DT FROM ( SELECT ID AS TODO_ID ,TEL_NO ,NAME FROM TB_CM06M01 WHERE ID = (SELECT MNG_ID FROM TB_CM04M01 WHERE DEPT_ID = (SELECT DEPT_ID FROM TB_CM06M01 WHERE ID = #{userId})) ) A ) T

SELECT 'KKO'||TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YY') || LPAD(TB_SM18M01_SQ01.NEXTVAL, 6, 0) MAX_MESSAGE_ID , T.* FROM ( SELECT A.TODO_ID , A.NAME , A.TEL_NO , #{todoTitle} AS TODO_TITL , #{todoNo} AS TODO_NO , MAX(A.TODO_DIV2_CODE_NM) AS TODO_DIV2_CODE_NM , #{sanctnDiv2} AS SANCTN_DIV2 , (SELECT MSSAGE_DESC AS MSSAGE_DESC FROM TB_BM17M01 WHERE 1=1 AND TMPLAT_DIV = #{tmplatDiv}) AS MESSAGE_DESC , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS SEND_DT , #{userId} AS ORDRG_MNG_ID , #{ordrgMngNm} AS ORDRG_MNG_NM , (SELECT Z.TEL_NO FROM TB_CM06M01 Z WHERE Z.ID = #{userId}) AS TEL_NO FROM ( SELECT X.WBS_PLAN_MNG_ID AS TODO_ID, (SELECT FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(X.WBS_PLAN_CODE_ID) FROM DUAL) AS TODO_DIV2_CODE_NM,
Y.NAME, Y.TEL_NO FROM TB_WB22M01 X LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CM06M01 Y ON X.WBS_PLAN_MNG_ID = Y.ID WHERE X.CO_CD = #{coCd} AND X.SALES_CD = #{salesCd} AND X.VER_NO = #{verNo} AND X.WBS_PLAN_CODE_KIND = 'WBSCODE' AND X.WBS_PLAN_MNG_ID IS NOT NULL AND X.WBS_PLAN_MNG_ID != #{userId} ) A GROUP BY A.TODO_ID, A.NAME, A.TEL_NO ) T

SELECT 'KKO'||TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YY') || LPAD(TB_SM18M01_SQ01.NEXTVAL, 6, 0) MAX_MESSAGE_ID , A.WBS_PLAN_MNG_ID1 AS TODO_ID , A.NAME , A.TEL_NO , #{todoTitle} AS TODO_TITL , #{todoNo} AS TODO_NO , (SELECT FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(WBS_PLAN_CODE_ID1) FROM DUAL) AS TODO_DIV2_CODE_NM , #{sanctnDiv2} AS SANCTN_DIV2 , (SELECT MSSAGE_DESC AS MSSAGE_DESC FROM TB_BM17M01 WHERE 1=1 AND TMPLAT_DIV = #{tmplatDiv}) AS MESSAGE_DESC , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS SEND_DT , #{userId} AS ORDRG_MNG_ID , #{ordrgMngNm} AS ORDRG_MNG_NM , (SELECT Z.TEL_NO FROM TB_CM06M01 Z WHERE Z.ID = #{userId}) AS TEL_NO FROM ( SELECT MAX(CO_CD1) AS CO_CD1, -- CO_CD2, MAX(WBS_PLAN_NO1) AS WBS_PLAN_NO1, -- WBS_PLAN_NO2, MAX(WBS_PLAN_CODE_KIND1) AS WBS_PLAN_CODE_KIND1, -- WBS_PLAN_CODE_KIND2, MAX(WBS_PLAN_CODE_ID1) AS WBS_PLAN_CODE_ID1, -- WBS_PLAN_CODE_ID2, SALES_CD1, -- SALES_CD2, MAX(SEQ1) AS SEQ1, -- SEQ2, WBS_PLAN_MNG_ID1 AS WBS_PLAN_MNG_ID1, -- WBS_PLAN_MNG_ID2, MAX(WBS_PLANS_DT1) AS WBS_PLANS_DT1, -- WBS_PLANS_DT2, MAX(WBS_PLANE_DT1) AS WBS_PLANE_DT1, -- WBS_PLANE_DT2, MAX(M.NAME) AS NAME, MAX(M.TEL_NO) AS TEL_NO, MAX(CHK) AS CHK FROM ( SELECT X.CO_CD AS CO_CD1, Y.CO_CD AS CO_CD2, X.WBS_PLAN_NO AS WBS_PLAN_NO1, Y.WBS_PLAN_NO AS WBS_PLAN_NO2, X.WBS_PLAN_CODE_KIND AS WBS_PLAN_CODE_KIND1, Y.WBS_PLAN_CODE_KIND AS WBS_PLAN_CODE_KIND2, X.WBS_PLAN_CODE_ID AS WBS_PLAN_CODE_ID1, Y.WBS_PLAN_CODE_ID AS WBS_PLAN_CODE_ID2, --X.VER_NO, --Y.VER_NO, X.SALES_CD AS SALES_CD1, Y.SALES_CD AS SALES_CD2, X.SEQ AS SEQ1, Y.SEQ AS SEQ2, X.WBS_PLAN_MNG_ID AS WBS_PLAN_MNG_ID1, Y.WBS_PLAN_MNG_ID AS WBS_PLAN_MNG_ID2, X.WBS_PLANS_DT AS WBS_PLANS_DT1, Y.WBS_PLANS_DT AS WBS_PLANS_DT2, X.WBS_PLANE_DT AS WBS_PLANE_DT1, Y.WBS_PLANE_DT AS WBS_PLANE_DT2, CASE WHEN (X.WBS_PLAN_MNG_ID||X.WBS_PLANS_DT||X.WBS_PLANE_DT) != NVL(Y.WBS_PLAN_MNG_ID||Y.WBS_PLANS_DT||Y.WBS_PLANE_DT, '..') THEN 1 END AS CHK FROM TB_WB22M01 X LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT CO_CD, WBS_PLAN_NO, WBS_PLAN_CODE_KIND, WBS_PLAN_CODE_ID, SALES_CD, VER_NO, SEQ, WBS_PLAN_MNG_ID, WBS_PLANS_DT, WBS_PLANE_DT FROM TB_WB22M01_HIST WHERE CO_CD = #{coCd} AND SALES_CD = #{salesCd} AND VER_NO = (SELECT MAX(TO_NUMBER(VER_NO)) FROM TB_WB22M01_HIST WHERE CO_CD = #{coCd} AND SALES_CD = #{salesCd} ) ) Y ON X.CO_CD = Y.CO_CD AND X.SALES_CD = Y.SALES_CD AND X.WBS_PLAN_CODE_ID = Y.WBS_PLAN_CODE_ID WHERE X.CO_CD = #{coCd} AND X.SALES_CD = #{salesCd} AND X.WBS_PLAN_CODE_KIND = 'WBSCODE' AND X.WBS_PLAN_MNG_ID IS NOT NULL AND X.WBS_PLAN_MNG_ID != #{userId} ) Z LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CM06M01 M ON Z.WBS_PLAN_MNG_ID1 = M.ID WHERE CHK = 1 GROUP BY WBS_PLAN_MNG_ID1, SALES_CD1 ) A
